Welcome to full-scapez 24-7 online Hosted owner is fullhouse & FS JSCOTTY
client download [url=http://up.ht/16jNJLK]client download link[/url] forum at [url=http://fullscape.freeforums.org]FORUM LINK[/url] highscores at:[url=http://full-scape.zapto.org/highscores/highscores.php]HIGHSCORES LINK[/url]

item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

What is with people having multiple websites for one server… It’s getting worse and worse everyday. Just get a free web host and make a simple website and download free forum software and upload them both to your web host. It is not that difficult if you really want people to play your server. As for your server though, I don’t see anything unique.

Read full topic
